summary: Soon after a stranger arrives in a little village, a mysterious sickness starts spreading. A policeman, drawn into the incident, is forced to solve the mystery in order to save his daughter.
cast: Do-won Kwak|Jung-min Hwang|Jun Kunimura|Woo-hee Chun|Hwan-hee Kim|Jin Heo|Jang So-Yeon|Do-yoon Kim|Kang-gook Son|Seong-yeon Park|Chang-gyu Kil|Jeon Bae-soo|Mi-nam Jeong|Gwi-hwa Choi|Seung-chul Baek|Hyeok-Joon Kwon|Chae-ik Park|Gi-Cheon Kim|Soon-woong Yoo|Jo Han-Chul|Tae-Seong Seo|Gyo-sik Choi|Song-il Kim|Yong-geun Bae|Jae-il Im|In-Chul Lee|Seon-joo Jo|Yong-nyeo Lee|Chang-gil Moon|Seok-jeong Hwang|Choon-gi Kim|Seon-hee Lee|Jeong-eun Lee|Ri-Geol Hong|Do-won Jeong|Hyeok Lee|Chang-Hoon Lee|Ji-Won Kim|Eun-hae Kim|So-jeong Park|Soo-Jeong Seong|Ah-ra Kim|Soo-Yeon Ahn|Ji-Hoon Jo|Mi-yeong Yoon|Dong-gil Lee|Hyeon-ho Lee|Ji-ho Kim|Chi-ho Song|Hyo-Jeong Im|Soo-jin Lee|Yeon Lee|Jae-Hyeon Sin|Yeon-kyeong Lee|Jae-man Woo|Jin-seong Lee|Ho-sam Seon|Kwi-deok Kwon|Min-seok Song|Jeong-ae Hyeon|Jae-Yeong Sin|Hyeon-Kyeong Kim|Myeong-ja Lee|Jeong-seon Seong|Jeong-seop Sin|Bo-Kyeong Kim|Won-yong Song|Amy Kang|Yeon-Kyeong Lee|Seung-mo Lee|Hoon Song|Soo-bin Lee|Bo-Kyeong Jeong
